agents.flight.DepartureSlotRequester¶

class agents.flight.DepartureSlotRequester(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: Role

DSR: Departure Slot Requester

Description: When the time of the EOBT ready aircraft arrives then the departing slot is requested. 1. Request departure slot 2. Request estimate taxi-out time to compute AOBT

__init__(*args, **kwargs)¶

On initialisation of a Role, it gets a pointer to the Agent it belongs to.
